preqs: The completion of all 16 JD core units and 2 electives.

rules.ruleString: For COURSE_CODE IN {L6005} Do Must have passed 108 credit points Otherwise true

(Must have passed 13 (I/W) units in {LAW5003, LAW5004, LAW5005, LAW5007, LAW5008, LAW5009, LAW5010, LAW5011, LAW5012, LAW5013, LAW5014, LAW5015, LAW5016, LAW5017, LAW5018} AND  Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {LAW5%})

description: In this unit, students apply research, thinking and communication skills and specialist discipline knowledge to complete an independent research project. Students will receive a six hour introduction on research skills at the start of the project and three hours mid way. The emphasis is upon independent study with the use of library online information regarding study skills.Further information is available at:http://www.monash.edu/law/current-students/postgraduate/enrolment-guidelines-pg-law-5052
